_sText:
FY_Snow_Redux The map is based on one of the most popular CS 1.6 FY maps, fy_snow.
The remake is situated in the suburbs of a city, near it's industrial region, in the construction yard of an unfinished building.




  • The weapons are the most common for the fy maps. Of course, a scout for each side is placed to keep the originality.

  • The position of the grenades are similar to the original fy_snow's ones.
  • In the middle of the map there is a buy zone for the both teams.
  • Soundscape included
  • HDR
+ It has radar and overview textures

Although the map is detailed and has many props and smoke over the whole yard, I optimised it as much as I can.





Optimised with:

  • NODRAW textures
  • Hint/Skip
  • Props fading
  • Func_Detail
  • Balanced Lightmapping
  • Reduced skybox size
Video:


Please comment, it's appreciated :)
